MEMÓRIA DE INSTRUÇÕES:

0) 0000101111111111 // P0: read 11
1) 0100101011111111 // P1: read 10
2) 0101101000000010 // P1: write 10 <- 00 02
3) 0001101000000111 // P0: write 10 <- 00 07
4) 0100110011111111 // P1: read 12

CACHES L1:

P0:

0) I | 10 | 00 10 -> 1010000000000001
1) S | 11 | 00 11 -> 1011010000001011
2) M | 12 | 00 20 -> 1100110000010100
3) S | 13 | 00 13 -> 1101010000001101
4) -

P1:

0) I | 10 | 00 10 -> 1010000000001010
1) S | 14 | 00 14 -> 1110010000001110
2) I | 12 | 00 12 -> 1100000000001100
3) -
4) -

P2:

0) I | 11 | 00 11 -> 1011000000001011
1) I | 12 | 00 12 -> 1100000000001100
2) S | 13 | 00 13 -> 1101010000001101
3) S | 14 | 00 14 -> 1110010000001110
4) -
